notifications.description: Your time off request for BEACH DAY has been denied

notifications.title: Time off request reviewed
notifications.description: Your time off request for WEDDING has been approved

notifications.title: Don't forget to clock-in!
notifications.description: Your shift starts in 5 minutes. Clock-in now!

notifications.title: Lunch time!
notifications.description: You have one hour to take lunch

notifications.title: Don't forget to clock-out!
notifications.description: Your shift has ended. Clock-out now!

notifications.title: PAYDAY
notifications.description: You should have received your paycheck through direct deposit. Contact HR for any issues
